menu.description: A selection of appetizers to start your meal.

items.name: Spring Rolls
items.description: Crispy spring rolls filled with choice of meat or vegetables.

items.name: Salt & Pepper Wings
items.description: Spicy and savory salt and pepper wings.

items.name: Salt & Pepper Tofu
items.description: Crispy tofu with salt and pepper seasoning.

items.name: Salt & Pepper Chicken Pieces
items.description: Bite-sized chicken pieces with salt and pepper seasoning.

items.name: Bao Bun (Pork or Chicken)
items.description: Soft bao bun with choice of pork or chicken filling.
items.ingredients: Bao bun, pork or chicken, sauce

items.name: Bao Bun Vegan Chicken
items.description: Vegan bao bun filled with vegetables.

items.name: Salt & Pepper Fries
items.description: Crispy fries seasoned with salt and pepper.

menu.description: Classic Vietnamese noodle soups and dishes.

items.name: Pho Bo
items.description: Traditional beef noodle soup.

items.name: Pho Qa
items.description: Classic chicken noodle soup.

items.name: Bun Bo
items.description: Spicy beef noodle soup for those who like a kick.
items.ingredients: Beef, rice noodles, spices, herbs, broth

items.name: Bun Ga
items.description: Spicy chicken noodle soup with a flavorful broth.
items.ingredients: Chicken, rice noodles, spices, herbs, broth

items.name: Pho Chay
items.description: Vegetarian tofu noodle soup.
items.ingredients: Tofu, rice noodles, vegetables, herbs, broth

items.name: Bun Tofu
items.description: Spicy vegetarian tofu noodle soup.
items.ingredients: Tofu, rice noodles, spices, vegetables, herbs, broth

items.name: Vegan Chicken Pho
items.description: Vegan Vietnamese noodle dish with fresh vegetables.

menu.description: A selection of grilled and main dishes served with rice or noodles.

items.name: Salt & Pepper Chicken Pieces + Rice
items.description: Savory salt & pepper chicken pieces served with rice.

items.name: BBQ Chicken Loaded Fries
items.description: Loaded fries topped with BBQ chicken.

items.name: BBQ Chicken + Rice/Noodles
items.description: BBQ chicken served with a choice of rice or noodles.
items.ingredients: BBQ chicken, rice or noodles, sauce

items.name: Pork Skewers + Rice/Noodles
items.description: Flavorful lemongrass pork skewers with rice or noodles.

items.name: Spring Rolls + Noodles (Meat or Veg)
items.description: Spring rolls served with noodles, available in meat or vegetarian options.

items.name: Salt & Pepper Vegan Chicken + Rice
items.description: Vegan chicken pieces with salt and pepper seasoning served with rice.
